name: windmill
tagline: A developer platform for turning scripts into workflows
description: Windmill is an open-source, self-hostable developer platform that turns scripts into production-grade workflows, APIs, and internal apps. It supports multiple languages, scheduling, webhooks, auto-generated UIs, and offers commercial cloud hosting.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Run scripts in Python, TypeScript, Go, Bash, or SQL as workflows or APIs instantly

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Create complex automation workflows with a visual flow editor and conditional logic

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Automatically generate web interfaces for scripts with form inputs and result displays

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Expose scripts as HTTP endpoints that can be called from external systems

features.title: Secret Management
features.description: Store API keys, passwords, and credentials securely with encrypted secret storage

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Track script changes with Git integration for collaboration and rollback capability

features.title: Dependency Management
features.description: Automatically handle package dependencies for Python, npm, and other ecosystems
